text: what brings you in today
My girlfriend's been worried about me. I've been really tired, and my legs swell up. It's hard to keep up with work.
when did you first notice this swelling
I started noticing my legs swelling a few months ago. It's gotten worse over time, going up past my knees now.
and what did you notice you started feeling really tired
I guess I started feeling really worn out around the same time the swelling began, maybe a few months back. It's like I'm tired all the time now.
did you notice any other symptoms starting around this time
Yeah, I started feeling nauseated most days, and everything I eat tastes like metal. My girlfriend says my breath smells funny too.
can you describe funny
She says my breath smells like fish or chemicals. Not exactly pleasant.
have you been up taking care of your renal failure
I don't know much about that. You'd have to ask the doctors.
tell me about your past medical history
I've had high blood pressure since my thirties. I had a mild stroke a while back, but I got better. I also had some lung congestion before that landed me in the hospital.
when were you in the hospital for your lungs
I don't really remember the exact time, but it was a while back. It cleared up after some treatment.
when did you have a stroke
I had the stroke a few years ago. It caused some temporary weakness on my left side, but I recovered from it.
are you taking any medications
Yeah, I have a bunch of medicines I'm on that I can't pronounce. My girlfriend makes me keep a list in my wallet.
can we see the list
Sure, I have it here: Furosemide, nifedipine, potassium chloride, clonidine patch, clopidogrel, atenolol, iron, and aspirin.
what are you taking this medications for
They're mostly for my high blood pressure and some other issues I've been having. I just take what the doctors tell me to.
have you had any kidney issues
Not that I know of. My dad had kidney disease, though. You'd have to ask the doctors if it's related to what's going on with me.
are you experiencing any chest pain
No, I haven't noticed any chest pain lately. Just shortness of breath when I walk too far or climb stairs.
what's your diet like
I try to keep it simple. My girlfriend and I eat out on weekends, but I avoid adding too much salt. Everything tastes like metal, so eating's been tough. I drink coffee every morning.
have you noticed any swelling
Yeah, my legs swell up pretty bad, sometimes going past my knees. It's been happening for a few months now.
have you noticed any weight change
Yeah, I've dropped some weight without trying. Food doesn't sit right anymore, so I haven't been eating much.
have you had any issues with coughing
No, I haven't had any issues with coughing lately. Just shortness of breath sometimes.
have you had any trouble swallowing
No, I haven't had any trouble swallowing. It's mostly the nausea and metallic taste that's bothering me.
does anything make your symptoms better or worse
I haven't noticed anything that makes them better, but moving around too much seems to make me feel worse, especially with the swelling and fatigue.
do you smoke tobacco
No, I don't smoke.
do you drink alcohol
I have a few beers occasionally, like on Fridays, but not often.
have you still been able to sleep regularly
Not really. I don't sleep much anymore. My legs twitch at night, and I wake up covered in this white, powdery stuff on my skin. It's been tough.
do you have any problems urinating or have any urinary incontinence
I pee less than I used to, and sometimes it's dark, but I figured it was just because I wasn't drinking enough. No incontinence, though.
any pain upon urination
No, I haven't experienced any pain when urinating.
urine urine what color is your
Sometimes it's dark, but I thought it might be because I'm not drinking enough fluids.
do you ever feel excessively thirsty
I haven't noticed feeling excessively thirsty, just the usual here and there.
have you had any changes to your Bowe3ls
Not that I've noticed. It's mostly been the nausea and the metallic taste that's been bothering me.
your skin changes
I've noticed some bruises showing up for no reason, and I wake up with a white, powdery frost on my skin that I can brush off. My skin also itches when my legs are swollen.
have you had any history of eczema
No, I haven't had any history of eczema.
tell me about your family medical history
My dad had high blood pressure, diabetes, and kidney disease, and he died young at 45. My mom had breast cancer and passed away at 60.
have you been breathing normally
I get short of breath when I walk too far or climb stairs, but otherwise, I breathe normally.
have you had any recent infections
No, I haven't had any recent infections that I'm aware of.
have you been feeling cold lately more than usual
Sometimes I feel cold, but other times I suddenly sweat out of nowhere. It's been a mix of both.
have you ever had thyroid issues
No, I've never had any thyroid issues.
have you experienced night sweats
Yeah, I wake up drenched in sweat sometimes. It's been happening more often lately.
have you noticed any lumps anywhere in your body
No, I haven't noticed any lumps anywhere.
have you had a fever recently
No, I haven't had a fever recently.
have you had any back pain
I haven't noticed any specific back pain, just a deep ache in my bones and general weakness.
any recent injury or trauma
No, I haven't had any recent injury or trauma.
have you traveled anywhere recently
No, I haven't traveled anywhere recently.
have you ever used recreational drugs
No, I don't use drugs.
do you have any allergies
None that I know of.
tell me more about your bone pain
It's a deep ache, like I've been hauling pipe all day, even when I haven't done anything. It feels like it's in my bones, not just muscle soreness.
do you feel like the bone pain is all over your body or in certain locations
It feels like it's mostly in my legs and arms, but sometimes it's hard to tell exactly where.
are you experienced any joint pains or muscle weakness
Yeah, my arms and legs feel weak. I can't lift things like I used to. No specific joint pains, though.
are you experiencing any numbness or tingling
Yes, my fingers and toes tingle or go numb sometimes, especially when I'm driving.
have you noticed any trouble with coordination or balance
Sometimes I get dizzy if I stand up too fast, but I haven't noticed any major trouble with coordination or balance.
do you have any history of diabetes
No, I don't have a history of diabetes, but my dad did.
any legal history to report
No, I don't have any legal history to report.
any pets
No pets at the moment.
any abdominal pain constipation or diarrhea
I haven't noticed any abdominal pain, constipation, or diarrhea. It's mostly been nausea and that metallic taste in my mouth.
have you vomited
Yeah, I've vomited a few times lately. It usually happens when I'm feeling really nauseated.
how often do you vomit
It doesn't happen every day, but it's been a few times over the past month or so.
what color is your vomit
It's usually just the regular color, nothing unusual like blood or anything.
is there a specific trigger for your vomiting
I haven't noticed a specific trigger. It tends to happen when I'm feeling really nauseated, especially in the mornings.
? how is your oral hygiene
I brush my teeth regularly, but my girlfriend says my breath still smells bad, like fish or chemicals.
does the feeling of nausea resolve/go away as the day progresses
The nausea is there most days, but it sometimes eases up a bit as the day goes on.
Any visual changes/problems?
My girlfriend says my eyes look puffy and like they're bulging a bit. Bright lights bother me sometimes.
How has your blood pressure been at home?
It's been staying high, even with all the pills I'm taking. Doesn't seem to come down much.
